original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical solutions, blending keen analytical skills with strong communication abilities. As a key player in our [mention specific system] ecosystem, you will be responsible for translating complex business needs into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your technical proficiency, combined with a deep understanding of our business processes, will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support our evolving operational needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear communication of business needs.
- Translate those business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues that arise.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to uncover insights.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively analyze complex business processes and translate them into technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and ensure clear understanding of requirements
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to support the development and maintenance of system configurations
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to leverage these technologies in developing innovative solutions

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business acumen with technical proficiency, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or process engineer
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations and solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies to support the iterative development and implementation of system configurations
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems to leverage industry-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Expertise in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work independently and proactively to drive project delivery
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies as the business evolves

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between our business objectives and the technical solutions that enable them. As a [mention specific system] configuration specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations that drive efficiency, accuracy, and continuous improvement. Your blend of technical proficiency and business acumen will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support our evolving operational needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear communication of business needs.
- Analyze the gathered requirements and develop comprehensive configuration specifications that address the identified business needs.
- Implement and test new configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and other system components.
- Proactively identify opportunities to optimize existing configurations, streamline business processes, and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to validate that they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure the solutions are fit for purpose.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to uncover insights.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively analyze complex business processes and translate them into technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and ensure clear understanding of requirements
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to support the development and maintenance of system configurations
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to leverage these technologies in developing innovative solutions

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that requires the blending of business and technical expertise, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or process engineer
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations and solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies to support the iterative development and implementation of system configurations
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems to leverage industry-specific knowledge

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Expertise in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work independently and proactively to drive project delivery
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies as the business evolves

Role Overview:
This role is a crucial bridge between our business objectives and the technical solutions that enable them. As a [mention specific system] configuration specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations that drive efficiency, accuracy, and continuous improvement. Your blend of technical proficiency and deep understanding of our business processes will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support our evolving operational needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear communication of business needs.
- Analyze the gathered requirements and develop comprehensive configuration specifications that address the identified business needs, leveraging your technical expertise to design optimal solutions.
- Implement and test new configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and other system components, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.
- Continuously monitor and analyze existing configurations to identify opportunities for optimization, streamlining business processes, and enhancing system efficiency through the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to validate that they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure the solutions are fit for purpose and meet stakeholder expectations.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements, enabling knowledge transfer and continuous improvement.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, serving as a technical subject matter expert.
- Leverage data analysis tools and techniques to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, providing data-driven insights to drive strategic decision-making.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively analyze complex business processes and translate them into innovative technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to liaise with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and ensure clear understanding of requirements
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences, fostering effective knowledge sharing

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to support the development and maintenance of system configurations
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to leverage these technologies in developing cutting-edge solutions that drive business value

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5-7 years of experience in a role that requires the blending of business and technical expertise, such as a senior business analyst, system architect, or process engineer
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations and solutions that have delivered measurable improvements

Preferred Experience:
- Expertise in Agile methodologies to support the iterative development and implementation of system configurations, fostering continuous improvement
- Extensive familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems to leverage industry-specific knowledge and best practices

Tools & Technologies:
- Mastery of [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI) to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making
- Expertise in project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence) to ensure efficient project delivery and stakeholder alignment

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement and a focus on innovation
- Ability to work independently and proactively to drive project delivery, while also contributing to the team's collective success
- Commitment to continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies and methodologies as the business evolves
